sourcesContent:
<ngx-datatable
  class="material"
  [rows]="filteredData"
  [columns]="columns"
  [columnMode]="'force'"
  [headerHeight]="50"
  [footerHeight]="50"
  [rowHeight]="'auto'">
  
  <ngx-datatable-header>
    <ngx-datatable-column *ngFor="let column of columns">
      <ng-template ngx-datatable-header-template let-column="column">
        <input type="text" placeholder="Filter {{ column.name }}" (input)="updateFilter($event, column.prop)">
      </ng-template>
    </ngx-datatable-column>
  </ngx-datatable-header>

  <ngx-datatable-body>
    <ngx-datatable-row *ngFor="let row of filteredData">
      <ngx-datatable-column *ngFor="let column of columns">
        <ng-template ngx-datatable-cell-template let-value="value">
          {{ row[column.prop] }}
        </ng-template>
      </ngx-datatable-column>
    </ngx-datatable-row>
  </ngx-datatable-body>
</ngx-datatable>



<ngx-datatable
  class="w-full border border-gray-300"
  [rows]="filteredData"
  [columnMode]="'force'"
  [headerHeight]="50"
  [footerHeight]="50"
  [rowHeight]="'auto'">
  
  <ngx-datatable-column *ngFor="let column of columns" [prop]="column.prop" [name]="column.name">
    <ng-template ngx-datatable-header-template let-column="column">
      <input type="text" placeholder="Filter {{ column.name }}" (input)="updateFilter($event, column.prop)">
    </ng-template>
  </ngx-datatable-column>
</ngx-datatable>
